author: Staff Reporter
text:
The election officials have published the phone numbers and email addresses of returning officers for the 13 Assembly constituencies in Vellore district.

Arakkonam: Parameswari, DADWO, Vellore – 99764 44688, email id: dadwo.tnvlr@nic.in.

Sholinghur: Saraswathi, ICO, Vellore – 94430 33559, email id: icovellore@gmail.com.

Katpadi: K. Mathivanan, SDC (Stamps), Vellore – 75984 90865, email id: sdcvellore@tnreginet.net.

Ranipet: P. Murugesan, Revenue Divisional Officer, Ranipet – 94450 00416, email id: rdorpt.tnvlr@nic.in.

Arcot: Selvaraj, SDC (SSS), Vellore – 94454 61759, email id: sdcsss.tnvlr@nic.in.

Vellore: Ajay Srinivasan, Revenue Divisional Officer, Vellore – 94450 00417, email id: rdotnvlr@nic.in.

Anaicut: J. Narayanan, AC, Excise, Vellore – 90423 67447, email id: acex.tnvlr@nic.in, ro.anaicut@gmail.com.

K.V.Kuppam: Kothandaraman, PA (NMP), Vellore – 74026 06588, email id: nmpvlr.tn.nic.in.

Gudiyatham: T. Kumaresan, SDC (SSI), Vellore – 83441 76080, email id: dcssi.tnvlr@nic.in.

Vaniyambadi: S. Jayaprakash, DBCWO, Vellore – 94442 67094, email id: dbcwo.tnvlr@nic.in.

Ambur: K. Kanthasamy, DSO, Vellore – 94450 00184, email id: dso.tnvlr@nic.in.

Jolarpet: Valarmathi, PA (Lands), Vellore - 94424 74454, email id : apa.tnvlr@nic.in

Tirupattur: Chandrakala, Assistant Collector, Vellore – 94450 00418, email id: rdotptr.tnvlr@nic.in.
title: EC publishes contact details of returning officers
